entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 06:00 AM CDT Monday 02 May 2016
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 2 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Monday 02 May 2016
